block.p: * Auction Universe, New York and Yalesville, Conn., an on-line auction Web site owned by the Times Mirror Co., named two agencies to handle accounts with combined billings estimated at $10 million. Romann Group, New York, will handle traditional advertising and Modem Media. Poppe Tyson, New York, part of True North Communications, will handle creative and media placement for on-line advertising. Also, R/GA Interactive, New York, another unit of True North, was named to handle Web site design.

* Chasetel Wireless Communications, Chattanooga, Tenn., to Johnson Group, Chattanooga, as the first agency to handle its account. Billings were estimated at $4 million. Johnson Waterhouse, Chattanooga, will handle public relations.
